text:
The installer for Apache 1.3.28 (apache_1.3.28-win32-x86-no_src.msi) quit 
working with an error message, something like "Network error: Can't access file 
apache_1.3.23-win32-x86-no_src.msi". You may note the wrong version number 
which is not my typo.

If you rename the installer executable to apache_1.3.23-win32-x86-no_src.msi 
everything works fine.
creator: acbugzilla@ynx.de
kess@kess-net.de
text:
It work's for me, so I assume the problme must be elsewhere.

Did you run 1.3.23 previously? 
If yes, did you uninstall it? Did the uninstall run successfully?

creator: acbugzilla@ynx.de
text: No, there wasn't any installation of apache on this computer before. Strange...

creator: Gtebrugge@tiffg.ca
